backup.help:
§3[BackupMod]§r §eCommands:
§b/backup§7 - Show this help menu
§b/backup create§7 - §aCreate a new backup
§b/backup create <name>§7 - §aCreate a new backup with custom name
§b/backup restore <name>§7 - §aRestore a specific backup
§b/backup restorelatest§7 - §aRestore the latest backup
§b/backup list§7 - §aList all backups
§b/backup delete <zip>§7 - §cDelete a backup zip
§b/backup upload <url> <name>§7 - §aDownload a backup ZIP from link
§b/backup rename <zipfile> <newname>§7 - §aRename backup ZIP (only before first dash)
§b/backup autobackup <num>§7 - §aSet auto-backups per day (1-10)
§b/backup autobackup off§7 - §aDisable auto-backups
§b/backup autobackup request§7 - §aShow auto-backup status
§b/backup maxbackup <num>§7 - §aSet max backups (1-20)
§b/backup maxbackup off§7 - §aRemove backup limit
§b/backup maxbackup request§7 - §aShow backup limit
§b/backup lang <lang_lang>§7 - §aChange plugin language
§b/backup exclude <file/folder>§7 - §cExclude file/folder
§b/backup enclude <file/folder>§7 - §aInclude file/folder
§b/backup help§7 - §aShow help again
§b/backup permissions add <player>§7 - §aGrant backup permission
§b/backup permissions remove <player>§7 - §cRemove backup permission
§b/backup permissions list§7 - §aList all with permissions
§b/backup log normallog on/off§7 - §aToggle normal log
§b/backup log permlog on/off§7 - §aToggle permission log
backup.permissions_not_found: §cPlayer not found or no permission entry.
backup.restore.noexist: §b[BackupMod] §c{0} does not exist and cannot be restored.
backup.kick: §3[BackupMod]§r §cAll players will be kicked during restore.
